Constructor Detail

ImageAdapter

public ImageAdapter(Context c,
                    int w,
                    Domineering dom)
Constructor for an ImageAdapter. This class maps images to the GridView based on the squares array in the Domineering object.

Parameters:
c - The context in which the GridView is placed.
w - The width of the screen and the gameboard.
dom - The Domineering object with which we are concerned.
See Also:
BaseAdapter
Method Detail

getCount

public int getCount()
Returns the number of squares.

getItem

public java.lang.Object getItem(int position)
Returns the item at the specified position. Irrelevant in our case.

getItemId

public long getItemId(int position)
Returns the ID of the item at the specified position. Irrelevant in our case.

getView

public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
This method is called in the mapping of images to the GridView.

Parameters:
position - The position of the current image in the grid.
convertView - If this isn't null, its contents are used in lieu of creating a new ImageView.
parent - The ViewGroup which will hold the ImageView.
Returns:
View
See Also:
View, ViewGroup, ImageView
